items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities and achievements with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workout summaries to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
Privacy settings allow users to control who can see their posts
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds
Privacy settings must comply with relevant data protection regulations

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made about core fitness tracking and social feed features. Further clarification needed on integration with external social networks.
